title: PBE help....
body: So i created a account for pbe a few hours ago, downloaded the zip file for the pbe runner. Then i realized that I forgot the username of the account and password. Now i can't create a pbe account or retrieve it. Any help?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

For issues regarding accounts, [shoot a ticket over](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support. They'll be able to help you out!
